dt: {bc}a relatively high level of cultural and technological development
{bc}the stage of cultural development at which writing and the keeping of written records is attained
{bc}the culture characteristic of a particular time or place

dt.t: the impact of European {wi}civilization{/wi} on the lands they colonized
{wi}civilization{/wi} is a slow process with many failures and setbacks
Our African safari was quite interesting, but it was great to get back to {wi}civilization{/wi}.

shortdef: a relatively high level of cultural and technological development; specifically : the stage of cultural development at which writing and the keeping of written records is attained
the culture characteristic of a particular time or place
